document_name: Minister of Forestry Regulation P.68/Menhut-II/2008 on Implementation of Demonstration Activities Reducing Carbon Emissions from Deforestation and Forest Degradation
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/IDN/2008/IDN-2008-12-25-Minister of Forestry Regulation P.68_Menhut-II_2008 on Implementation of Demonstration Activities Reducing Carbon Emissions from Deforestation and Forest Degradation_8e0655a72fdfde036aeee6d3b9575f6c.pdf
document_description: This regulation sets out the rules that REDDdemonstration activities should adhere to/. It is therefore fundamental enabling legislation for the development of REDDin Indonesia.
